resources.string: Take an embarrassing photo of yourself
Now it\'s time to choose the number to send this photo to should you not make it to your appointment
Where would you like this picture posted should you not make it to your appointment?
Take an embarrassing picture of yourself
Specifically someone who you do not want to see that picture
Drag and zoom the map so that the red square covers the appointment location
Track the time and location of your lectures.
Check in to let us know that you\'ve made it on time.
Miss class and an embarrassing photo of you will be posted to Facebook.
Phone number to be sent to
Blackmail encourages users to arrive at their appointments on time by blackmailing them with an embarrassing photo.
Lorem ipsum sans limier this is some long filler title that will probably wrap to two lines

The embarrassing photo, phone number, and appointments are stored in the cloud. So no matter if the application is uninstalled, the photo will be sent if the user does not check in to their appointment on time.
